wallclock.author: Intel Corporation
wallclock.description: Provides int packets on a timely manner (after each system clock hour changes)

in_ports.description: Enables or disables the wallclock, based on the value of the packet received. When stopped, the wallclock will cease to emit packets from the OUT port.
in_ports.name: ENABLED

wallclock.name: wallclock/hour

members.description: If true, a packet containing the current hour will be sent during initialization
members.name: send_initial_packet

out_ports.description: An int range packet when wallclock hour ticks.
out_ports.name: OUT

wallclock.description: Provides int packets on a timely manner (after each system clock minute changes)

in_ports.description: Enables or disables the wallclock, based on the value of the packet received. When stopped, the wallclock will cease to emit packets from the OUT port.
in_ports.name: ENABLED

wallclock.name: wallclock/minute

members.description: If true, a packet containing the current minute will be sent during initialization
members.name: send_initial_packet

out_ports.description: An int range packet when wallclock minute ticks.
out_ports.name: OUT

in_ports.description: Enables or disables the wallclock, based on the value of the packet received. When stopped, the wallclock will cease to emit packets from the OUT port.
in_ports.name: ENABLED

members.description: If true, a packet containing the current month will be sent during initialization
members.name: send_initial_packet

out_ports.description: An int range packet when wallclock month ticks.
out_ports.name: OUT

in_ports.description: Enables or disables the wallclock, based on the value of the packet received. When stopped, the wallclock will cease to emit packets from the OUT port.
in_ports.name: ENABLED

wallclock.author: Intel Corporation
wallclock.description: Provides int packets on a timely manner (after each system clock second changes)

in_ports.description: Enables or disables the wallclock, based on the value of the packet received. When stopped, the wallclock will cease to emit packets from the OUT port.
in_ports.name: ENABLED

members.description: If true, a packet containing the current second will be sent during initialization

out_ports.description: An int range packet when wallclock second ticks.
out_ports.name: OUT

wallclock.author: Intel Corporation
wallclock.description: Provides int packets on a timely manner (after each system clock week day changes)

in_ports.description: Enables or disables the wallclock, based on the value of the packet received. When stopped, the wallclock will cease to emit packets from the OUT port.
in_ports.name: ENABLED

wallclock.name: wallclock/weekday

members.description: If true, a packet containing the current weekday will be sent durinng initialization
members.name: send_initial_packet

out_ports.description: An int range packet when wallclock week day ticks.
out_ports.name: OUT

wallclock.author: Intel Corporation
wallclock.description: Provides int packets on a timely manner (at each day's time block). A day is split in blocks of minutes defined by options. Last block may be smaller than others.

in_ports.description: Enables or disables the wallclock, based on the value of the packet received. When stopped, the wallclock will cease to emit packets from the OUT port.
in_ports.name: ENABLED

wallclock.name: wallclock/timeblock

members.description: Time block interval. Defines the length of a frame in minutes. Last block may be smaller than others. For example, if interval is set to 50 minutes, it would tick 29 times a day, but interval for last one is just 48 minutes.
members.name: interval

members.description: If true, a packet containing the current timeblock will be sent durinng initialization
members.name: send_initial_packet

out_ports.description: An int range packet when wallclock time block changes. An initial packet is sent informing current time block.
out_ports.name: OUT

in_ports.description: Enables or disables the wallclock, based on the value of the packet received. When stopped, the wallclock will cease to emit packets from the OUT port.
in_ports.name: ENABLED

wallclock.name: wallclock/year

members.description: If true, a packet containing the current year will be sent during initialization
members.name: send_initial_packet

out_ports.description: An int range packet when wallclock year ticks.
out_ports.name: OUT
